values.text: It'92s the bra that has just what your curves need. Carry yourself with ease and comfort all day long with a piece that will feel like second skin. Timeless in design and contemporary in style, this classic bra is likely to become an instant favourite for everyday wear.nnSometimes all a full-figured woman wants is a good quality foundation bra that is comfortable and gives reliable support. The double layered, seamed cups of this bra provide wirefree comfort and full coverage even as the wide side wings prevent spillage. Plus! The wider elastics give added support and comfort.

reviews.description: Good quality cotton; nice fit, even for people who are busty. Tried buying a cotton bra for the first time and this one surely didn't let me down.rnThough, I wish they had it for bigger cups too.
Very comfortable especially for bigger sizes
